[i][b]The story of an advanced Jewish girl named Yentl, who used to study the Torah (the Jewish bible) when no woman could do it. After losing her father, she decides to go to a Yeshiva, the Jewish school for priests. The big problem is that only boys are allowed to study there. Therefore, Yentl decides to undercover 
herself as as a boy. Everything is fine until she falls in love for a study friend.
[/b][/i]
